Quests.Name: clara_kolanuttree
Quests.Title: First steps to Cola 1/3
Quests.Description: Clara wants you to bring her the fruit of a Red Kola Nut Tree.
Quests.ReactionText: Thanks! Now that you have a Red Kola Tree that gives you its fruit, you should try to process it.

Quests.Name: clara_kolanutpowder
Quests.Title: First steps to Cola 2/3
Quests.Description: Clara wants you to bring her the powder of the Red Kola Nut.
Quests.Objective: Bring Kola Nut Powder to Clara
Quests.ReactionText: Great! Now that you're able to make powder, we need to moisturize it. I'll give you the recipe for my newest machine!

Quests.Name: clara_kolanutsyrup
Quests.Title: First steps to Cola 3/3
Quests.Description: Clara wants you to bring her the syrup of the Red Kola Nut.

Quests.Name: clara_basecola
Quests.Title: Final steps to Cola 1/2
Quests.Description: Clara wants you to bring her the base for the cola.

Quests.Name: clara_firstflavor
Quests.Title: Final steps to Cola 2/2
Quests.Description: Clara wants you to bring her any flavored cola.
Quests.ReactionText: Tasty! Wow! We finally got our own flavored cola! Thanks for helping me with this experiment!
